00088             function                get_posted_setting( &$Manifest )
00089             {
00090                   try
00091                   {
00092                         $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
00093                         
00094                         switch( $Manifest->get_setting( 'type' , 'input' ) )
00095                         {
00096                               case( 'input' ):
00097                                     return( $this->Security->get_gp( $SettingName , 'string' , '' ) );
00098                                     
00099                               case( 'checkbox' ):
00100                                     return( intval( $this->Security->get_gp( $SettingName , 'integer' ) ) );
00101                                     
00102                               case( 'textarea' ):
00103                                     return( $this->Security->get_gp( $SettingName , 'string' , '' ) );
00104                         }
00105                   }
00106                   catch( Exception $e )
00107                   {
00108                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00109                   }
00110             }
00111             
00130             function                set_db_setting( &$Manifest )
00131             {
00132                   try
00133                   {
00134                         $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
00135                         $DefaultValue = $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' );
00136                               
00137                         $SettingValue = $this->DBSettings->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue );
00138                         $NewSettingValue = $this->get_posted_setting( $Manifest );
00139                         
00140                         if( $SettingValue != $NewSettingValue )
00141                         {
00142                               $this->DBSettings->set_setting( $SettingName , $NewSettingValue );
00143                         }
00144                   }
00145                   catch( Exception $e )
00146                   {
00147                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00148                   }
00149             }

00169             function                set_package_setting( &$Manifest )
00170             {
00171                   try
00172                   {
00173                         $PackageName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_name' , false );
00174                         $PackageVersion = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00175                         $ConfigFileName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'config_file_name' );
00176                         $SettingName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'setting_name' );
00177 
00178                         $SettingValue = $Manifest->get_package_setting( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ConfigFileName , 
00179                                                             $SettingName , $Manifest->get_setting( 'default_value' , '' ) );
00180                         $NewSettingValue = $this->get_posted_setting( $Manifest );
00181 
00182                         if( $SettingValue != $NewSettingValue )
00183                         {
00184                               $Manifest->set_package_setting( 
00185                                     $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ConfigFileName , $SettingName , $NewSettingValue
00186                               );
00187                         }
00188                   }
00189                   catch( Exception $e )
00190                   {
00191                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00192                   }

00213             function                process_config_line( $ConfigLine )
00214             {
00215                   try
00216                   {
00217                         $Manifest = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00218                         $Manifest->load_settings( $ConfigLine );
00219                                     
00220                         $PackageName = $Manifest->get_setting( 'package_name' , false );
00221                         if( $PackageName === false )
00222                         {
00223                               $this->set_db_setting( $Manifest );
00224                         }
00225                         else
00226                         {
00227                               $this->set_package_setting( $Manifest );
00228                         }
00229                   }
00230                   catch( Exception $e )
00231                   {
00232                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00233                   }
00234             }

00254             function                save_settings( $Options )
00255             {
00256                   try
00257                   {
00258                         $FormsName = explode( ',' , $Options->get_setting( 'form_name' ) );
00259 
00260                         foreach( $FormsName as $i => $FormName )
00261                         {
00262                               $ConfigPath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'settings::settings_view' , 'last' ).
00263                                     "/conf/cf_$FormName";
00264                               if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $ConfigPath ) )
00265                               {
00266                                     $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ConfigPath , 'exploded' );
00267                                     
00268                                     foreach( $Config as $i => $ConfigLine )
00269                                     {
00270                                           
00271                                           $this->process_config_line( $ConfigLine );
00272                                     }
00273                               }
00274                         }
00275                   }
00276                   catch( Exception $e )
00277                   {
00278                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00279                   }
00280             }

00300             function                controller( $Options )
00301             {
00302                   try
00303                   {
00304                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00305 
00306                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_save_settings' );
00307                         
00308                         if( $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ ) )return;
00309                   }
00310                   catch( Exception $e )
00311                   {
00312                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00313                   }
